```{r Define Functions}
# add sheet to workbook
add_sheet <- function(wb, df, sheet_name) {
  openxlsx::addWorksheet(wb, sheet_name)
  openxlsx::writeData(wb, sheet_name, df, startRow = 1, startCol = 1)
}

# blank theme for plots
blank_theme <- function(){
  theme_bw() +
    theme(
      panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
      axis.text = element_text(color = 'black', size = 8, family = 'sans'),
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust=0.5, margin = margin(t = 1)),
      strip.text.x = element_text(size = 8),
      axis.title = element_text(size = 9.5, face = 'bold'),
      plot.title = element_blank(),
      legend.position = 'right',
      legend.box = 'vertical',
      legend.title = element_blank(),
      legend.title.align = 0,
      legend.box.margin = margin(-5,0,0,0),
      legend.spacing.y = unit(-0.2, 'cm'),
      legend.text = element_text(size = 8)
    )
}
```

```{r Import and Clean Data}
# read in data
df_benthic <- read_csv(fp_benthic, show_col_types = FALSE)

# create workbook for new data
wkbk_export <- createWorkbook()

# append raw data to new xlsx
# add_sheet(wkbk_export, df_benthic, getSheetNames(wkbk_raw))

# convert date column, rename
df_benthic <- df_benthic %>% rename(Date = SampleDate)
df_benthic$Date <- as.Date(df_benthic$Date, format = '%m/%d/%Y')

# remove dashes in station names
df_benthic$StationCode <- unlist(lapply(df_benthic$StationCode, function(x) str_split(x, '-')[[1]][1]))

# factor stations by figure order
station_factor <- c('D24','D16','D28A','P8','C9','D4','D6','D7','D41','D41A')
df_benthic$StationCode <- factor(df_benthic$StationCode, levels = station_factor)

# list of classification col names
classif <- c('Phylum','Class','Order','Family','Genus','Species')

# grab report year (for saving purposes)
report_year <- as.integer(format(Sys.Date(), '%Y'))-1

# create a plots dir (for saving purposes)
years_ts_dir <- paste('02_Benthic/annual-report/',report_year,'Plots/years_timeseries')
ry_ts_dir <- paste('02_Benthic/annual-report/',report_year,'Plots/',report_year,'_timeseries')
ry_bar_dir <- paste('02_Benthic/annual-report/',report_year,'Plots/',report_year,'_bargraphs')

dir_list <- c(years_ts_dir, ry_ts_dir, ry_bar_dir)

for (dir in dir_list){
  dir.create(file.path(dir), recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)
}
```

```{r All Years & All Stations Timeseries}
# ---  Calculate Monthly/Yearly Totals ---
# create df of totals by month/year
df_month_sums <- df_benthic %>%
  # separate(Date, c('Month', 'Year'), ' ') %>%
  group_by(Month, Year, StationCode) %>%
  mutate(Grab_Count = max(Grab)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  distinct(Month, Year, StationCode, Grab_Count, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  group_by(Month, Year) %>%
  mutate(Grab_Count = sum(Grab_Count), Station_Count = length(unique((StationCode)))) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'Month', 'Year', 'Grab_Count', 'Station_Count')) %>%
  summarize(Orgs_Total = sum(Count, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop')

df_month_sums$Date <- with(df_month_sums, paste(Month, Year))

# get grab variable
df_grab_vari <- df_month_sums[!duplicated(df_month_sums$Date),]

df_grab_vari <- df_grab_vari %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(Grab_Count = sum(Grab_Count)) 

# create df of totals by year
df_year_sums <- df_month_sums %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'Year')) %>%
  summarize(Orgs_Total = sum(Orgs_Total, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop')

df_year_sums <-  merge(df_year_sums, df_grab_vari, by = 'Year', all.x=FALSE, all.y=FALSE)

# create CPUE dfs
df_month_CPUE <- df_month_sums %>%
  mutate(CPUE_Total = Orgs_Total/Grab_Count/0.052) %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'Month', 'Year'))

df_year_CPUE <- df_year_sums %>%
  mutate(CPUE_Total = Orgs_Total/Grab_Count/0.052) %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'Year'))

# merge dfs
df_year <- merge(df_year_sums, df_year_CPUE, all = TRUE)
df_month <- merge(df_month_CPUE, df_month_sums,  all = TRUE)

df_year <- df_year[!df_year$Phylum == 'n/a',]
df_month <- df_month[!df_month$Phylum == 'n/a',]

# remove extra cols
df_month <- subset(df_month, select = -c(Station_Count))

rm(df_year_sums, df_year_CPUE, df_month_sums, df_month_CPUE)

# append to workbook
add_sheet(wkbk_export, df_year, 'Yearly Totals (All)')
add_sheet(wkbk_export, df_month, 'Monthly Totals (All)')

# --- Create Timeseries ---
# add a name col to year
df_year$Name <- with(df_year, paste(Phylum, Genus, Species))

# subset top 10 species by average CPUE
df_year_top <- df_year %>%
  group_by(Name) %>%
  mutate(Mean = mean(CPUE_Total)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Mean)) %>%
  ungroup()

df_year_top <- df_year_top[df_year_top$Mean %in% unique(df_year_top$Mean)[1:10],]

# complete cases
suppressWarnings(df_year_top <- df_year_top %>% complete(Year, nesting(Name, Mean)))
df_year_top$CPUE_Total[is.na(df_year_top$CPUE_Total)] = 0
df_year_top$Mean[is.na(df_year_top$Mean)] = 0

# trick R cause it's dumb
df_year_top$Name2 <- df_year_top$Name
df_year_top$Year2 <- df_year_top$Year
df_year_top <- subset(df_year_top, select = -c(Name, Year))
df_year_top$Year <- df_year_top$Year2
df_year_top$Name <- df_year_top$Name2
df_year_top <- subset(df_year_top, select = -c(Year2, Name2))

# re-order
df_year_top$Name <- with(df_year_top, reorder(Name, Mean))

# plot
colorCount = length(unique(df_year_top$Name))
getPalette = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(8, 'Set2'))

plt <- ggplot(df_year_top, aes(Year, CPUE_Total, group = Name)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = Name), size = 1) +
  geom_point(aes(color = Name), size = 1.7) +
  scale_color_manual(values = getPalette(colorCount)) +
  ylab(expression('Individuals/m'^2)) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE)) +
  blank_theme() 

ggsave(paste0(years_ts_dir,'/CPUE_all.png'), plot = plt, width = 8, height = 4)

rm(df_year_top)
# TODO: look into .dots
```


```{r Specific Stations Timeseries}
# ---  Calculate Monthly/Yearly Totals ---
# create df of station totals by month/year
df_month_stat_sums <- df_benthic %>%
  # separate(Date, c('Month', 'Year'), ' ') %>%
  group_by(Month, Year, StationCode) %>%
  mutate(Grab_Count = max(Grab)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'StationCode', 'Month', 'Year', 'Grab_Count')) %>%
  summarize(Orgs_Total = sum(Count, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop')

df_year_stat_sums <- df_month_stat_sums %>%
  group_by(Year, StationCode) %>%
  mutate(
    Month_Count = n_distinct(Month),
    Grab_Count = Grab_Count * Month_Count
    ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'StationCode', 'Year', 'Grab_Count')) %>%
  summarize(Orgs_Total = sum(Orgs_Total, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop')

# create df of station CPUE by month/year
df_month_stat_CPUE <- df_month_stat_sums %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'StationCode', 'Month', 'Year')) %>%
  mutate(CPUE_Total = Orgs_Total/Grab_Count/0.052) %>%
  ungroup()

df_year_stat_CPUE <- df_year_stat_sums %>%
  group_by(.dots = c(classif, 'StationCode', 'Year')) %>%
  mutate(CPUE_Total = Orgs_Total/Grab_Count/0.052) %>%
  ungroup()

# merge dfs
df_year_stat <- merge(df_year_stat_sums, df_year_stat_CPUE, all = TRUE)
df_month_stat <- merge(df_month_stat_CPUE, df_month_stat_sums, all = TRUE)

rm(df_year_stat_sums, df_year_stat_CPUE, df_month_stat_sums, df_month_stat_CPUE)

# --- Create All Years Timeseries ---
# add a name col to year
df_year_stat$Name <- with(df_year_stat, paste(Phylum, Genus, Species))

# subset top 10 species by average CPUE over all years
df_year_stat_top <- df_year_stat %>%
  group_by(Name, StationCode) %>%
  mutate(Mean = mean(CPUE_Total)) %>%
  arrange(Year, StationCode, desc(Mean)) %>%
  ungroup()

# append to workbook
add_sheet(wkbk_export, subset(df_year_stat_top, select = -c(Name, Mean)), 'Yearly Totals (Stations)')

for (station in unique(df_year_stat_top$StationCode)){
  # filter by station
  df_filt <- df_year_stat_top %>%
    filter(StationCode == station) %>%
    mutate(CPUE_Sum = sum(CPUE_Total)) %>%
    group_by(Name) %>%
    mutate(Percentage = round(sum(CPUE_Total)/CPUE_Sum*100,2)) %>%
    ungroup()

  # subset species that are top 10 (average CPUE over all years)
  df_filt <- df_filt[df_filt$Percentage %in% unique(df_filt$Percentage)[1:10],]
  
  # complete missing cases
  df_filt <- df_filt %>% complete(Year, nesting(Name, StationCode, Percentage))
  
  df_filt$CPUE_Total[is.na(df_filt$CPUE_Total)] = 0
  df_filt$Percentage[is.na(df_filt$Percentage)] = 0
  
  # trick R cause it's dumb
  df_filt$Name2 <- df_filt$Name
  df_filt$Year2 <- df_filt$Year
  df_filt$Percentage2 <- df_filt$Percentage
  df_filt$StationCode2 <- df_filt$StationCode
  df_filt <- subset(df_filt, select = -c(Name, Year, Percentage, StationCode))
  df_filt$Year <- df_filt$Year2
  df_filt$Name <- df_filt$Name2
  df_filt$Percentage <- df_filt$Percentage2
  df_filt$StationCode <- df_filt$StationCode2
  df_filt <- subset(df_filt, select = -c(Year2, Name2, Percentage2, StationCode2))
  
  # re-order
  df_filt$Name  <- with(df_filt, reorder(Name, Percentage))
  
  # set color palette
  colorCount = length(unique(df_filt$Name))
  getPalette = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(8, 'Set2'))

  # plot
  plt <- ggplot(df_filt, aes(Year, CPUE_Total, group = Name)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = Name), size = 1) +
    geom_point(aes(color = Name), size = 1.7) +
    scale_color_manual(values = getPalette(colorCount)) +
    ylab(expression(bold('Individuals/m'^2))) +
    guides(color = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE)) +
    blank_theme() 

  ggsave(paste0(years_ts_dir,'/CPUE_',station,'.png'), plot = plt, width = 8, height = 4)
}

# --- Create Report Year Timeseries ---
# add a name col to year
df_month_stat$Name <- with(df_month_stat, paste(Phylum, Genus, Species))

# subset top 10 species by average CPUE over all months in a given year
df_month_stat_top <- df_month_stat %>%
  group_by(Name, StationCode, Year) %>%
  mutate(Mean = mean(CPUE_Total))

# factor month col
df_month_stat_top$Month = factor(df_month_stat_top$Month, levels = month.name)

# arrange df
df_month_stat_top <- df_month_stat_top %>%
  arrange(Year, Month, StationCode, desc(Mean))

# append to workbook 
add_sheet(wkbk_export, subset(df_month_stat_top, select = -c(Name, Mean)), 'Monthly Totals (Stations)')

# create timeseries only for report year
for (station in unique(df_month_stat_top$StationCode)){
  # filter df by report year and station
  df_filt <- df_month_stat_top %>%
    filter(StationCode == station,
           Year == report_year) %>%
    group_by(StationCode) %>%
    mutate(CPUE_Sum = sum(CPUE_Total)) %>%
    ungroup %>%
    group_by(Name) %>%
    mutate(Percentage = round(sum(CPUE_Total)/CPUE_Sum*100,2)) %>%
    ungroup %>%
    arrange(desc(Percentage))

  # filter out top ten species
  df_filt <- df_filt[df_filt$Percentage %in% unique(df_filt$Percentage)[1:10],]
  df_filt <- df_filt[df_filt$Percentage >= 1,]
  
  # add missing cases
  df_filt$Date <- paste(df_filt$Month, df_filt$Year)
  
  df_filt <- df_filt %>%
    complete(Date, nesting(Name, StationCode)) %>%
    separate(Date, c('Month2', 'Year2'), ' ')
  
  # trick R cause it's dumb (re-adding cols as non-funcs)
  df_filt$Month <- df_filt$Month2
  df_filt$Year <- df_filt$Year2
  df_filt$Name2 <- df_filt$Name
  df_filt <- subset(df_filt, select = -c(Name))
  df_filt$Name <- df_filt$Name2
  df_filt <- subset(df_filt, select = -c(Name2, Month2, Year2))

  # fix up df
  df_filt$Month = factor(df_filt$Month, levels = month.abb)
  df_filt$CPUE_Total[is.na(df_filt$CPUE_Total)] = 0
  df_filt$Mean[is.na(df_filt$Mean)] = 0

  # re-order
  df_filt$Name  <- with(df_filt, reorder(Name, Mean))

  # define color scheme
  colorCount = length(unique(df_filt$Name))
  getPalette = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(8, 'Set2'))
  
  # plot timeseries
  ts <- ggplot(df_filt, aes(Month, CPUE_Total, group = Name)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = Name), size = 1) +
    geom_point(aes(color = Name), size = 1.7) +
    scale_color_manual(values = getPalette(colorCount)) +
    ylab(expression(bold('Individuals/m'^2))) +
    guides(color = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE)) +
    blank_theme() 

  ggsave(paste0(ry_ts_dir,'/CPUE_',station,'.png'), plot = ts, width = 8, height = 4)
}

rm(df_month_stat_top, df_year_stat_top)
```

```{r Create RY Bargraphs  and Calc Phylums}
# --- Calc Phylums by Month ---
# condense by phylum (all months)
df_ry_phy <- df_report_month %>%
  group_by(Phylum, Month) %>%
  summarize(Orgs_Total = sum(Orgs_Total), CPUE_Total = sum(CPUE_Total)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(Month) %>%
  mutate(Sum_Total = sum(Orgs_Total)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(Phylum, Month) %>%
  mutate(Percentage = round(Orgs_Total/Sum_Total*100,2)) %>%
  ungroup()

# remove extra col
df_ry_phy <- subset(df_ry_phy, select = -c(Sum_Total))

# factor month col
df_ry_phy$Month = factor(df_ry_phy$Month, levels = month.abb)

# arrange df
df_ry_phy <- df_ry_phy %>%
  arrange(Month, desc(Percentage))

# condense by phylum per station (all months)
df_ry_stat_phy <- df_report_month_stat %>%
  group_by(Phylum, StationCode, Month) %>%
  summarize(Orgs_Total = sum(Orgs_Total), CPUE_Total = sum(CPUE_Total)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(StationCode, Month) %>%
  mutate(Sum_Total = sum(Orgs_Total)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(Phylum, StationCode, Month) %>%
  mutate(Percentage = round(Orgs_Total/Sum_Total*100,2)) %>%
  ungroup()

# remove extra col
df_ry_stat_phy <- subset(df_ry_stat_phy, select = -c(Sum_Total))

# factor month col
df_ry_stat_phy$Month = factor(df_ry_stat_phy$Month, levels = month.abb)

# add color col
df_ry_stat_phy <- df_ry_stat_phy %>%
  mutate(
    Color =
      case_when(
        Phylum == 'Mollusca' ~ '#8da0cb',
        Phylum == 'Arthropoda' ~ '#fc8d62',
        Phylum == 'Annelida' ~ '#66c2a5',
        Phylum == 'Nematoda' ~ '#e78ac3',
        Phylum == 'Phoronida' ~ '#a6d854',
        Phylum == 'Cnidaria' ~ '#ffd92f',
        Phylum == 'Chordata' ~ '#fb9a99',
        Phylum == 'Nemertea' ~ '#d9d9d9',
        Phylum == 'Platyhelminthes' ~ '#d9d9d9',
        Phylum == 'Echinodermata' ~ '#bc80bd',
        Phylum == 'Nematomorpha' ~ '#8dd3c7'
      )
  )

# df_ry_stat_phy$Color <- as.factor(df_ry_stat_phy$Color)
df_ry_stat_phy$Phylum <- as.factor(df_ry_stat_phy$Phylum)

# arrange df
df_ry_stat_phy <- df_ry_stat_phy %>%
  arrange(StationCode, Month, desc(Percentage))

# create graphs
i <- 2

for (station in unique(df_ry_stat_phy$StationCode)){

  df_filt <- df_ry_stat_phy %>%
    filter(StationCode == station)
  
  # check phyla less than 1% of total year
  df_check <- df_filt %>%
    mutate(Total_Check = sum(Orgs_Total)) %>%
    group_by(Phylum) %>%
    mutate(Percent_Check = round(sum(Orgs_Total)/Total_Check*100,2)) %>%
    ungroup()
  
  rare_phyla <- unique(df_check$Phylum[df_check$Percent_Check <= 1])
  
  df_filt <- df_filt[!df_filt$Phylum %in% rare_phyla,]
  
  df_filt$Phylum <- with(df_filt, reorder(Phylum, CPUE_Total))
  
  # arrange df
  df_filt <- df_filt %>%
    group_by(StationCode, Phylum) %>%
    mutate(Order = sum(Percentage)) %>%
    arrange(StationCode, Month, Order) %>%
    ungroup()
  
  # graph
  bar <- ggplot(df_filt, aes(Month, CPUE_Total, fill = factor(Color, levels = unique(df_filt$Color)))) +
    geom_col(color = 'black') +
    scale_fill_identity(guide = 'legend', labels = rev(df_filt$Phylum), breaks = rev(df_filt$Color)) +
    ylab(expression(bold('Individuals/m'^2))) +
    blank_theme() 
  
  ggsave(paste0(ry_bar_dir,'/Fig',i,'_',station,'.png'), plot = bar, width = 6, height = 3.5)
  
  i <- i + 1
}

# --- Calc Phylums by Year ---
```
